==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*Yazadaha may be derived from two Sanskrit words: yasa which means "fame",<ref>https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/yasa</ref> and daha which means "pool".<ref>https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/daha</ref>
